messages.title: My Plan
messages.content: 1) Provide more police for our towns and villages reducing crime and anti-social behaviour, backed up by tougher sentences and more prison places. 2) Protect our countryside against unsustainable large-scale development and deliver a cleaner, greener environment for our children and grandchildren. 3) Champion local businesses, our High Streets, village stores and Sussex farmers. 4) Invest in our GPs, hospital, schools and social services enabled by a strong economy that only the Conservatives will deliver. 5) Build better bus and train services – faster, more reliable, and more frequent. Improve roads including the much needed Arundel Bypass. 6) Living locally in the constituency, I want to bring common sense to Westminster and be a strong voice for local residents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase police presence to reduce crime and anti-social behaviour, supported by tougher sentences and more prison places.
Oppose unsustainable large-scale development and promote a cleaner, greener environment.
Support High Streets, village stores, and local farmers.
Improve GP services, hospitals, schools, and social services with a strong economy.
Enhance bus and train services, and develop roads such as the Arundel Bypass.
Advocate for common sense in Westminster and act as a strong voice for local residents.
